title: Mobile Repairing Course
description: Microchip Expert Institute offers advanced Career oriented mobile and smar phone repairing course with advance technology and repairing tools. We learn about all types of mobile phone like Chinese, GSM & CDMA etc. Microchip Expert Institute have a well designed smart class room & regular practical lab with modern mobile repairing machine & tools. Pur trainer give circuit diagram, easy repairing procedure, latest guidance aids, ball making method by B.G.A. machine, Software training procedure and also spare parts supporting to students.
